structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 15. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2866-4, 2866-5.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Classified service; political activity forbidden; protection.
